It was developed and is maintained by Meta (formerly Facebook).\n\nKey features of React include:\n\n*   **Component-Based:** You build small, independent pieces of UI called "components" (like a button or a navigation bar) and combine them to create complex interfaces.\n*   **Declarative:** React makes it easy to create interactive UIs by efficiently updating and rendering the right components when your data changes.\n*   **Virtual DOM:** React uses a "Virtual DOM" to track changes in the UI.
